page.title: 08HORTICULTURE-EPPING GREEN
page.content: THE AREA AROUND EPPING GREEN HAS FOR MANY YEARS BEEN WELL KNOWN FOR ITS HORTICULTURAL PRODUCTS AND SOFT FRUIT GROWING.SHORTLY AFTER WORLD WAR II MANY ITALIANS,MAINLY FROM SICILY MIGRATED TO THE AREA,BRINGING WITH THEM THEIR SKILLS AND KNOWLEDGE OF GROWING PRODUCTS UNDER GLASS.FOR A TIME ALL WENT WELL.A READY MARKET WAS ON HAND IN LONDON,AND THE IMMIGRANTS INTEGRATED INTO THE COMMUNITY.THE CROP WAS MAINLY TOMATOES AND CUCUMBERS.TWO FACTORS HAVE LED TO A DECLINE IN THE MARKET FOR SUCH PRODUCTS.FIRSTLY THE IMPORTATION OF TOMATOES AND CUCUMBERS FROM THE CONTINENT AT PRICES BELOW WHAT IS ECONOMICALLY POSSIBLE FOR THE AREA TO PRODUCE.SECONDLY THE PROPOSED EXTENSION OF HARLOW NEW TOWN TO A POINT CLOSE TO ROYDON.THE GROWERS THEREFORE AWAIT AN ACT OF PARLIAMENT TO DETERMINE FUTURE DEVELOPMENTS.
